SEARCH
Package views

Class MainMenu

java.lang.Object
views.MainMenu
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class MainMenu extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
It is the Control of main menu for the appointment tableview and it is the main screen.

    • WeakRadioButtonChanged

      public void WeakRadioButtonChanged(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      It is used to populate table with appointments for next seven days. Appointments will show if the they fall within the seven day. Lambda expression is used in this method to filter the appointment table by week It is used to make code better by allowing the filter to take place in this WeakRadioButtonChanged method, rather than creating a separate method in the appointmentDB.
      Parameters:
      event -

    • MonthRadioButtonChanged

      public void MonthRadioButtonChanged(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      It is used to display all appointments by month.
      Parameters:
      event -
